question:
With reference to Sarnath, which among the following statements is / are correct?
1. Lord Buddha gave his first sermon here
2. A Jain tirthankara was born here
3. It is one of the four main Buddhist pilgrimage sites
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Shreyanshnatha the Jain Tirthankar was born in Sarnath. A Jain tirthankara was born here. It is one of the four main Buddhist pilgrimage sites.
